name: sandbox
//scripts: Commands that can be run using npm or yarn to perform various tasks in the project

scripts.//start: Runs the app in development mode with live reloading at http://localhost:3000
scripts.//build: Creates an optimized production build in the build/ folder ready for deployment
scripts.//test: Runs tests in watch mode, rerunning when files change
scripts.//eject: Removes the build dependency to gain full control over configurations (one-way operation)

//eslintConfig: Configuration for ESLint, a tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript/TypeScript

eslintConfig.//extends: Inherits configurations from create-react-app's default rules for React and Jest

//browserslist: Specifies which browsers the project should support in different environments

browserslist.//production: Targets a wide range of browsers for production builds to maximize compatibility
browserslist.//development: Targets modern browsers during development for faster builds and better debugging
